title: Thai language
summary: Thai,[lower-alpha 1] or Central Thai[lower-alpha 2] (historically Siamese;[lower-alpha 3] Thai: ภาษาไทย), is a Tai language of the Kra–Dai language family spoken by the Central Thai people[lower-alpha 4] and a vast majority of Thai Chinese. It is the sole official language of Thailand.[3][4]
